name: Cozy Attic Bedroom in Allston
description:
The room is on the 3rd floor of our home. There are 2 bathrooms one on the third floor and one on the second floor for your use. There is a large common area on the first floor with a fully stocked kitchen!

The space
This is a wonderful good sized room to explore Boston from. You have easy access to Harvard Square/MIT/Longwood Medical Center and Downtown Boston. The neighborhood is peaceful, and we have a large porch to enjoy the evening summer breeze. We also have a large yard and parking space for your convenience. The room has a king sized bed and probably one too many pillows, and looks out on our 130 year old silver maple which gives the impression of being in a tree house.

Guest access
You will have access to both bathrooms, washing/drying machines in the basement and all the first floor common space including the kitchen, dinning room, and living room.

name: Sunny bedroom in Allston
neighborhood_overview: We  live in quiet residential neighborhood (mostly houses not apartment complexes) and are a 3 min walk away from a grocery store.
description:
It's in a spacious single family home with 2 bathrooms. The room has 1 queen sized bed. There is a terrarium with a small docile ball python on the dresser. We have a fully stocked kitchen that you can use and 2 friendly cats!

The space
We are are graduate students who like to host and meet new people!

Guest access
You will have full access to the living room, dining room, kitchen and bathrooms and will be able to use all the common appliances (TV, cooking ware etc.)

name: Small Cozy Attic Bedroom
neighborhood_overview: We live in quiet residential neighborhood (mostly houses not apartment complexes) and are a 3 min walk away from a grocery store and coffee shops
description:
This room is our guest attic room. It is located on the 3rd floor of our 5 bedroom 2 bathroom house. You have access to both 2 and 3rd floor bathrooms, and the ground floor common areas, kitchen, dining room and porch.

The space
Our large and sunny house has 4 guest bedrooms which are rented to wonderful Airbnb guests. The house has a large common area on the ground floor where you can cook and hang out, with a large porch and yard.

Guest access
You will have access to both bathrooms, washing/drying machines in the basement and all the first floor common space including the kitchen, dinning room, and living room.

Other things to note
We have 2 wonderful cats that are friendly and cuddly!
